about_the_game:
Get ready for a thrilling and innovative racing experience with Karting Future Codepilot, a unique game that blends the high-speed excitement of kart racing with the strategic precision of golf! In this one-of-a-kind fusion, you’ll speed through a variety of beautifully crafted courses, using ramps, jumps, and boosts to navigate your way through dynamic terrain. But the twist? You’ll also need to skillfully putt your ball into the hole - using your kart!

Karting Future Codepilot offers three distinct game modes for endless fun and challenge.
In Race mode, you’ll face off against up to 7 opponents, all trying to outpace each other while still ensuring their ball reaches the goal. Success isn’t just about speed; it’s about making the perfect shot at the perfect moment.

Golf mode is all about precision, requiring you to calculate your angles and power as you aim to sink your ball with the fewest shots possible. Every course comes with its own unique challenges, and you’ll need both strategy and quick reflexes to dominate.

In Time Trials, the clock becomes your fiercest competitor as you race not just for the finish line but for the perfect time. Sharpen your skills, learn the best shortcuts, and master every track!

With a variety of power-ups and obstacles, from turbo boosts to hazards that can knock you off course, each race offers new surprises. The game features a wide range of environments, from futuristic cityscapes to scenic landscapes, all filled with ramps, tunnels, and shortcuts.
Customize your kart, improve your skills, and unlock achievements as you work your way through increasingly difficult challenges.

Whether you’re a fan of fast-paced racing or love the strategy of golf, Karting Future Codepilot combines the best of both worlds in an exhilarating way. Do you have what it takes to conquer the courses and prove yourself as the ultimate Codepilot? Hop in your kart and find out!
